imdb.title: Vandread
imdb.plot: In a space-fairing future the war between sexes becomes literal. A kid who works in a factory that produces giant military robots decides to steal one for himself and ends up in the middle of a dogfight that leads into an adventure.

episodes.title: Red Angel
episodes.plot: Hibiki and the women pilots have the same dream about a red light that attacks them and the Nirvana. The Nirvana responds to a pod emitting a distress signal, where Hibiki and the others see the same red light they saw in their dream.

episodes.title: Be My Baby
episodes.plot: When BC and Pyoro attempt to decode the message that a girl the Nirvana rescued was carrying, it affects the ship's systems. Ezra goes into labor during an enemy attack.

episodes.title: Blossoming Path
episodes.plot: The crew explore a planet whose environment poisons the people on it from birth. Bart becomes attached to a seriously ill girl from the planet.

episodes.title: Everything
episodes.plot: The Nirvana docks with an outpost to replenish its supplies, but its inhabitants appear to be less than hospitable to the crew.

episodes.title: Somedays
episodes.plot: The Nirvana encounters a Harvester mothership, which appears to contain a few surprises compared to the last mothership it fought.

episodes.title: Original Smile
episodes.plot: The Nirvana's crew mourns Gascogne, who was lost while engaging the Harvester mothership. Hibiki comes up with a plan to attack the mothership using Pyoro and the Earth message virus.

episodes.title: Kiss on My Cheek
episodes.plot: When a water leak floods the men's quarters, Hibiki finds himself caught in a love triangle with Dita and Misty.

episodes.title: Reality
episodes.plot: Hibiki volunteers to help Dita and Paiway plan a surprise birthday party for Meia. To keep Meia occupied, they arrange for her to babysit Ezra's baby. An enemy attack, however, threatens to derail their plans.

episodes.title: Embrace All
episodes.plot: During a combat mission, Hibiki becomes separated from the others and lands on a planet inhabited by people similar to Native Americans who communicate telepathically.

episodes.title: Easy Come, Easy Go
episodes.plot: The Nirvana's crew become excited and plan a celebratory banquet upon learning they are so close to Mejere.

episodes.title: Paradise
episodes.plot: Both the Tarak and Mejere fleets order the Nirvana's crew to surrender. Duelo learns that Hibiki is a first generation colonist and hides him in the Paexis. The women face a Mejere court, while the men and BC are taken to Tarak.

episodes.title: Himegoto
episodes.plot: The first generation leaders of Tarak and Mejere convene, including Magno. Hibiki addresses the leaders, rallying the people of both planets to fight with the Nirvana against the Harvesters.

episodes.title: Trust
episodes.plot: Hibiki confronts the leader of the Earth mothership. The combined armies of Tarak and Mejere fight their last battle with the Nirvana against the Harvesters.

episodes.title: Boy Meets Girl
episodes.plot: Hibiki Tokai, a teenage boy working as a parts mechanic, tries to steal a Vanguard from a newly commissioned battleship. He ends up having more to deal with, however, when a group of female pirates attack.

episodes.title: Soshite boku ha tohou ni kureru
episodes.plot: Hibiki meets two fellow Tarakians, Bart and Duelo, as they find themselves imprisoned on board and meet their female captors.

episodes.title: Kore ga watashi no ikiru michi
episodes.plot: The female pirates assign Bart, Duelo, and Hibiki to roles on board the ship.

episodes.title: Motto anata wo shiritakute
episodes.plot: Frustrated and annoyed by Dita and the other women's actions toward him, Hibiki gets himself reassigned to work under Gascogne. He learns the importance of the job when he and Gascogne fly out to support the others during a combat mission.

episodes.title: Amai wana
episodes.plot: The pirates train and send a team of women in vanguards to explore a desert planet. Dita and Jura try to placate Hibiki with food.

episodes.title: What a Wonderful World
episodes.plot: When Meia is seriously injured in a battle against the enemy, the rest of the team struggles to fight without her leadership. Meia dreams about her past as Duelo treats her.

episodes.title: Easy Life
episodes.plot: A misunderstanding between Hibiki and Dita over her kindness to him causes them to distance themselves from each other. Jura convinces Bart to go after Dita so she can get Hibiki.

episodes.title: Muri da!
episodes.plot: The crew find a deserted space station, where they meet Rabat, a male intergalatic trader, and his ape sidekick. As Rabat peddles his wares on board the Nirvana, BC suspects he may have more ulterior motives.

episodes.title: Tengoku yori yaban
episodes.plot: After fighting the enemy while in orbit around a planet, the crew encounter a civilization on the planet which is engrossed with the prophesied arrival of their god Munya.

episodes.title: White Love
episodes.plot: The crew track an ice comet while celebrating Christmas. Initially not familiar with the holiday, the men learn of its traditions, including that of giving presents, and react accordingly.

episodes.title: Issho ni...
episodes.plot: When several misunderstandings cause the women to turn against the men, Hibiki escapes in his vanguard and comes across a fleet of ships with humans attempting to escape a Harvester.

episodes.title: They Don't Care About Us
episodes.plot: Rabat rescues and returns Hibiki to the Nirvana. Having seen humans die for the first time, Hibiki vows revenge against the Harvesters.

episodes.title: To Feel the Fire
episodes.plot: When the crew of the Nirvana loses hope in winning against the Harvester flagship, Dita tries to rally them. Hibiki comes up with a risky plan to use a dying planet to attack the flagship.
